main event: An object was observed that seemed to be a target of some kind, which disappeared out of sight during a 30-minute observation period.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on June 6, 1957, in Barstow, California., The object was reported using ground radar., The observer maintained that the object was an aircraft., Various conclusions were drawn about the object, such as possibly being a balloon, aircraft, astronomical object, or bird., The observer noted that the object seemed to hover and then moved almost silently away before going out of sight.
witness description: observer was in a car and maintained that the object was an aircraft
